title: Evelyn Skins
body:
My account used to have the legacy evelyn skin and i cant see it at all in the champ select. did a skin get deleted?
Edit: The skin was shadow evelynn im pretty sure

replies.body:
It's possible that if a skin was gifted using fraudulent means, such as account hacking, or if a chargeback was involved, the skin may be removed from the recipient's account. I'm not sure if any of these apply to you, but you should check with Player Support regarding this inquiry!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
